Description: Molecules to restore heart function.
Full Description: We target therapeutics to human heart function, taking a precision approach to drug development and capturing the adult heart clinical phenotype. This is powered by our scalable, authentic and predictive discovery engine - HeartDyno.  HeartDyno is built with engineered human cardiac organoids, scalably deployed to drive a multi-omics data-driven approach. It rapidly uncovers novel therapeutic targets and candidates that offer superior efficacy and safety profiles in humans.  Dynomics’ approach is validated through collaboration with top pharmaceutical companies, top-tier scientific publications, and we are progressing assets targeting heart failure, affecting 4% of the US population and where current treatments provide a 50% 5-year survival rate.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Merchr was created on the belief that everyone, no matter what level of entrepreneurial spirit they possess, has the power to design, publish and profit. Over the last few years, selling online has become more straightforward and reachable for most store owners. However very few people have the resources to also be a graphic designer, product creator, merchandiser, and technology developer, and that is where our platform and creativity leans in. The Merchr team combines decades of experience with integrated technology to provide store owners with pre-designed, curated collections of products & designs suitable for all industries. These can be amended, customised, personalised and uploaded onto a new or existing store within minutes.  Our integration with major ecommerce platforms and a closely managed network of production hubs enables the sale of print-on-demand products, without inventory risk or expensive seller fees. Users include influencers, artists, bands, online brands, YouTubers, gamers, schools and charities.

Description: Build reliance to (the negative effects of) addictive technologies, Saas, B2B
Full Description: Hour25.ai is improving emotional resilience to social networks in real-time. People’s success (in work, family, and any life goal) is fundamentally affected by the increasing problem to focus. Our mission is to improve people’s ability to handle powerful social networks and other AI-based services (retail, news, etc.). Hour25.ai has developed and tested a unique mobile platform that increases focus by detecting for the user, in real-time, when his emotional state has driven him into the ‘hands’ of social networks. Then - help the employee boost attention using behavioral interventions targeted by these focus-negative feelings.  For example, when they validate that they’re bored, we provide them with a psychological exercise (video, quiz, short reading, music, etc.) to shift their focus towards where their focus lane is. For example - the boredom quiz asks them questions that help them understand the core reasons they are bored, which pulls them out of the unwanted emotional situation. AS a B2B company - we're targeted to provide a solution to many employers seeking to increase precious employees' productivity while ensuring they are happy.  Hour25.ai has the key to giving back one hour a day, solving this $650B problem.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Mobile, Science and Engineering, Software

The struggle to find a space to conduct your client meetings or the building pressure to locate a practice field for your child’s sports team is a time and labor-intensive activity that most of us take for granted.  Enter Spotz, the industry solution for managing, hosting, and booking spaces.  Spotz is the developer of a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform intended to help hosts manage and promote single and multiple reservable facilities and spaces so their facilities can be used to their maximum potential. Our platform also promotes excess space to potential renters and makes booking any space comparable to booking a hotel room, enabling entire communities to save time and increase space usage.

Description: IDEATE Medical develops sterilization technology for the safe and rapid terminal sterilization of all endoscopic devices.
Full Description: IDEATE Medical develops sterilization technology for the safe and rapid terminal sterilization of all endoscopic devices. The mission of IDEATE Medical is to lower the infection risk from the 75 million endoscope procedures conducted in the U.S. each year. IDEATE Medical understands the importance of efficacy, compatibility, and throughput and has developed a unique, innovative, low-temperature sterilization technology for the safe and rapid terminal sterilization of all endoscopic devices for every procedure.  Our technology utilizes the benefits of Vapor Hydrogen Peroxide (VHP) sterilization technology but incorporates key innovations to address the specific challenges associated with the terminal sterilization of long multi-channel endoscopic medical devices.  With its innovations, the most challenging endoscopic devices can be terminally sterilized in 30 minutes with no impact on the endoscopic device.

Industries: Battery, Clean Energy, CleanTech, Energy, Energy Efficiency, Energy Management, Energy Storage, Hydroelectric, Solar, Wind Energy
Description: Adaptive Energy Generation and Storage System
Full Description: Blue Power Systems was birthed in the wake of California's Carr and Mendocino Complex fires and the subsequent Camp Fire in 2018. The result of neglected and aging grid infrastructure, our founder sought a way to circumvent the grid altogether. He applied his 30+ years of experience in electric motor and battery technology to develop a compact yet robust microgrid system—a system that enables residential and commercial consumers alike to become grid independent and maximize the ROI on their solar, wind and hydro energy investments.  Personal experience and extensive research have led us to the conclusion that the prevailing battery backup solutions on the market are not cutting it. These sub-15 kWh systems provide little more than half-a-days power to the average American home, which consumes 30 kWh/day. Something more is needed. Like most people, our founder knew that he would never possess the massive solar arrays and battery storage to make sustainable living possible. He also personally felt the expense burden of generators and energy storage devices that cost him thousands of dollars up front, and thousands more in fuel and energy rationing down the road. With a breached pain threshold, he set out to make a change.  That change was Blue Power Systems. Offering a patent-pending, state-of-the-art hybrid microgrid system, BPS provides users a new solution—a self-sufficient unit that supports the average American home without energy rationing and without exorbitant fuel costs. The system keeps users energy independent by relying on multiple energy sources: renewable energy (such as solar, wind or hydro), grid energy (if available/whenever it’s cheap), and also generator energy (which charges the system batteries directly). Grid down? Use your generator and solar. Solar panels not working? Use your wind turbine and grid charge. Alternatives make our product practical.  Blue Power Systems is unique because of our hybrid approach, efficient generator system, and greater battery capacity. Typical generators run 24 hours (27.5 gallons/day) to power a home, releasing energy that may or may not get used while constantly emitting harmful gasses and particulate matter. Blue Power Systems runs its generator for 2.5 hours (2.875 gallons/day) to accomplish the same job; that’s 90% less fuel, 90% less pollution.  Further, our units include a revolutionary BLADE exhaust filter that are lab-proven to reduce PM 2.5 by 72% as well as Carbon Monoxide and Carbon Dioxide by 12%––meaning that our already efficient generation system has even more environmental protections in place. To top it off, 64 decibels at 20 feet make us quieter than a standard AC unit. An intuitive system control center enables users to customize their needs: renewable energy priority, cost priority, etc. The intelligent algorithms present both immediate and predictive data to the user via an elegant mobile phone app, which also displays real-time data collection concerning energy storage/usage/production.  People are beginning to look elsewhere as centralized power continues to falter. Blue Power Systems is not just a product, we're a movement.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Energy, Natural Resources, Sustainability

Description: Music Discovery Platform
Full Description: Introducing Showcase - the revolutionary music discovery platform designed to put emerging Artists and their music back in the spotlight. With a commitment to quality over quantity, Showcase offers a simple and easy-to-navigate application that shares content curated by real people with a passion for introducing new talent to the world. Built on 20 years of music industry experience, Showcase leverages the latest technology to deliver a virtual experience that captures the emotion of live music and the nostalgia of old-school radio. Users can discover new Artists, listen to their music, read their bios, and connect with them on social media or streaming platforms, all in one seamless experience. But that's not all. Showcase is designed to go beyond just introducing fans to new talent. The platform allows users to share their favorite emerging Artists with the Showcase team, potentially leading to a feature on the platform and exposure to a wider audience. In a market crowded with established Artists and complex streaming services, Showcase offers a unique and intimate journey for music fans to discover new talent, perhaps even in a genre they've never explored before. And with plans to expand beyond one Artist and one song a day, Showcase is set to become the go-to destination for music lovers looking for the next big thing. The Showcase team is made up of music enthusiasts, tech wizards, and connection makers, all committed to opening doors for emerging talent and helping them build a long-term following. And with each Artist having a say in how and when they are featured on the platform, Showcase offers a truly collaborative and Artist-centric experience. Join us on Showcase, where the music, the Artists, the fans, and the energy of human connection come together to create a platform that is more than just music discovery, it's a movement.

Our Authorized Education and Training Partners teach the Building and Leading Resilient Teams curriculum that we developed. This 7-week program meets the education/training requirement for each level of Resilience-Building Leadership Professional® (RBLP®) certification.  Collective resilience is the team’s ability to overcome adversity, and then adapt and grow together because of that adversity. Our vision is to create a worldwide community of practice committed to Building and Leading Resilient Teams. Resilient teams are the key to both individual and organizational resilience. Resilient teams are stronger together and they make learning and change possible. Our purpose is to share this truth with leaders everywhere.

Description: The world's first internet passport.
Full Description: Authillo is a passwordless login service that prevents fake accounts on any online platform, while simultaneously preserving user privacy. Our proprietary browser-based facial recognition & liveness detection software allows us to guarantee users are who they claim to be. Authillo acts as an internet passport that proves one's real-world identity, allowing platforms to safeguard their virtual environments from bots, malicious users, fake reviews, free trial exploitation, password sharing, impersonation, predation, catfishing, and more. Authillo minimizes the distribution of users’ personal data across the internet by limiting each platform’s access to only information users explicitly allow. Authillo is able to vouch for aspects of a user’s identity without giving platforms access to the corresponding user data, allowing us to serve as an abstraction layer between platforms and users. At Authillo, we’re obsessed with creating a privacy-centric internet free of fake accounts.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Professional Services, Software

Full Description: Headquartered in Austin, Texas, Productable is an innovation management platform that sets organizations up with everything they need to innovate successfully. Our all-in-one solution gives top-down leadership the reporting and insights they need to drive transformation quickly and gives bottom-up innovators the right process and right tools to scale their ideas into real solutions. Productable Founder & CEO Rachel Kuhr Conn launched the patent-pending SaaS platform in 2019 after almost a decade of testing innovation methodology. She first developed the Productable process as academic research with top institutions such as MIT then perfected it as head of innovation for Mark Cuban Companies and more than 20 other large corporations. Productable turned this process - widely known as Portfolio Innovation - into software and leverages it to help organizations of all sizes innovate successfully. Portfolio Innovation is all about creating an ecosystem that nurtures transformation, tackling innovation from the top, middle and bottom.

Description: Wildnote is an intuitive, customizable, digital platform for efficiently collecting (online/offline), managing, and reporting environmental.
Full Description: Wildnote is an intuitive, customizable, digital platform for efficiently collecting (online/offline), managing, and reporting environmental. Wildnote technology is so much more than a general, data-collection app. The company builds a cloud-based platform focused on the environmental-services industry - compliance, monitoring, restoration, and remediation. Its direct clients include the likes of AECOM, Jacobs Engineering, and Caskey Biological. Indirectly, Wildnote serves PG&E, SoCal Gas, and SDG&E, as examples. All are large-scale utility projects requiring years to complete.  Wildnote is a data-management system that includes a cross-platform mobile app, a web app, a library of prebuilt, standard forms for data collection, agency-ready forms for collection and reporting (Wetlands Delineation for the USACE as an example), customizable form capability, and a huge time-saving photo-management system that none of our competitors have.  Wildnote is a customizable, cloud-based platform that streamlines environmental data collection, management, and reporting, resulting in improved productivity and work quality, as well as time and money saved. Wildnote's features create efficiency that results in a minimum 1:10 cost to savings ratio.

Description: Developing Artificial General Intelligence
Full Description: ORBAI is developing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) that can serve all of humanity from corporations to nations to individuals. It can gather vast amounts of information and assimilate all that data, store and analyze it, then, on-demand, concentrate and narrow it to provide accurate, relevant information briefs and very specific forecasts that are tailored for the customer's needs, using its prediction capability that make it a modern day oracle. It will also provide online AI professional services like customer service, personal assistant, financial advisor, medical, legal, and other more advanced ones using an advanced language interface for speech and text. https://youtu.be/YE31u1FmoyA https://youtu.be/YE31u1FmoyA ORBAI is working on a new AI architecture with proprietary neural nets, tools, and processes that allow us to build advanced sensory processing and memory systems that mimic the human brain's ability to perceive, remember, predict, and plan. With this and the built in language capability, our Human AI Interface is able to be a powerful conversational voice assistant on platforms like mobile, smart homes and appliances, and in your vehicle, and also perform real information and customer-facing vocations online, like Medical, Finance, Legal, and others. As the Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) core advances, it becomes more powerful, with a broader data reach, and more advanced cognition, planning, prediction, vocational and communication skills. Companies could use it to plan their corporate strategy via their current Enterprise Resource Planning tools by interfacing them to our AGI and having it watch and learn their company’s internal operations, gather data about their whole ecosystem of customers, suppliers, partners, competitors, and the other market factors, then forecast different timelines and how they evolve into the future differently according to their decisions, allowing you to optimize their corporate decision-making and plan effective prescient timelines for product development, marketing/PR, sales, finance, legal,… into the future. Ordinary people can use it to plan their lives, evaluating different decisions they could make, from career, to marriage, to finances, and to see the trajectory of events that would result, and the probable outcomes. They can access AGI professional services like Finance, Legal, Medical, Counselor, Fitness Advisor, and hundreds of others, and these services would be available globally, rivaling the best such services by humans. An Artificial General Intelligence will quickly become the most powerful tool that humanity has ever had, making the revolutions spawned by electricity, computers, and the internet pale by comparison. Where we are now overwhelmed by a world's worth of information we could never humanly assimilate in our work lives and our personal lives, we will have something that can for go through it all for us, and give us exactly what we need, when we need it.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: Jadu is a multiplayer augmented reality (AR) game for mobile (iOS & Android).
Full Description: Jadu is a multiplayer augmented reality combat game for mobile (iOS & Android). Using the Jadu app, players convert their physical world into an arena where their avatars clash with remote opponents. Players can start rivalries with friends or compete against strangers for fame and glory in this fighting game from the future. Our goal is for millions of players to uncover dark realities & vibrant interactions in AR.  Previously, we’ve partnered closely with a number of collaborators including seven-time Formula One world champion, Lewis Hamilton; Canadian musician and internet sensation, GRIMES; legendary American rapper, Snoop Dogg and Transformers Producer/Director Michael Bay.   Jadu has gone from releasing AR headset based narratives at the Sundance and Tribeca Film Festivals to building educational AR with Serena Williams to creating a volumetric AR app with artists like Lil Nas X, K Camp & Pussy Riot. The team has 40+ XR projects under its belt and is widely considered pioneers in the AR space with their work being taught at institutions like UC Berkeley, MIT and USC. About Jadu’s CEO & Founder Asad J. Malik:  Asad J. Malik is an augmented reality pioneer. His critically-acclaimed and globally exhibited narrative storytelling projects Terminal 3 and A Jester’s Tale premiered at Tribeca and Sundance Film Festivals, positioning Asad as a visionary in the space before completing his undergraduate degree. Asad was named one of Variety’s 10 Innovators to Watch, Rolling Stone’s Future 25, Forbes’ 30 Under 30 and Adweek’s Young Influentials and also made The Independent’s Filmmakers to Watch list. He now sits on the Board of Trustees for Bennington College as a recent graduate.

There is also an anonymous gateway that allows tips from a credit card, and of course they can get their paychecks directly deposited into their account.  FISK: Mobile Tipping is designed to assist anyone in the service industry. The app helps them learn finance, all while they invest in their future. Users are building their future one tip at a time. With an adjustable split, putting money away for the future has never been so easy. Users can attach a preexisting account or use one of our partnering firms.  The younger generations will have problems if they rely only on Social Security for retirement. Understanding good financial habits is crucial in today's society. When users start, they see the power of compounding interest in small increments.   We all know the number one investment that they make is in themselves. Learning how to make good decisions with their money affects their future.  When FISK: Mobile Tipping is that it is set up correctly with a long-term investment account, and no matter what the split is, the tipper is altering the tippee's future. Yes, we just said that a mobile app alters the future of the user.

Description: Hire the right Data Scientist.  Fast!
Full Description: kaam.work solves two primary pain points: (1) high costs and more importantly, headaches of long-drawn full-time hiring cycles, and  (2) lack of dedicated focus and assured quality through outsourcing and freelancing We solve these pain points by creating a new engagement model for the modern workforce whereby our AI-enabled platform converts your english-like​ descriptors of business objectives or goals scientifically into work modules and skillsets that will be matched within our own curated pool of rockstars, who are full-time members of kaam.work. You engage with our members just like your in-locale full-time team members and work organically towards delivering the highest quality output without ever having to worry about change in deliverables or strategy. Because these members are only working at one engagement at a time, they passionately eat, breathe, and sleep only your Business and are rightly incentivized to deliver the highest quality output that makes sense for you. The pricing is per resource per month, akin to full-time salaries, but flexible for number of months of engagement.  We fundamentally believe that the current high levels of disengagement cannot be solved by constant job-hopping; the true solution lies in matching the 'work'​ with the 'worker'​.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Data and Analytics, Software

Full Description: Nuclear physics is a battleground of breakthroughs where modern tech is rapidly advancing our knowledge and capabilities. Nu Planet’s innovation is a scalable production process for rare isotopes used in pharma., energy, space & defense.  US supply is dominated by NIDC1 with smaller suppliers using costly solutions for select isotopes. Our multi-isotope platform, led by Dr. Steve Howe (Los Alamos & Idaho Labs), slashes cost benchmarks, creating an economic moat in a multi-$bn market.  Our priority isotopes, Actinium-225 & Lead-212, have been chosen for their impact at small scales and drastic under-supply. Through 2022 Nu Planet is scaling from the lab to a commercial production line in Scottsdale, AZ.

Description: Grain4Grain uses patent pending technology to effeciently upcycle spent grains into a low carb, high protein flour--in under 20 minutes.
Full Description: Grain4Grain is a San Antonio based food-tech startup. A couple years ago, we developed a patent pending process that allows us to dry and mill byproducts, specifically brewers spent grain, into a low carb, high protein flour. Spent grain is the number one byproduct from breweries and for over 100 years, breweries have been trying to develop a way to capitalize on this resource--think whey protein from cheese making. Our innovative methodology allows us to dry and mill brewers spent grain in under 20 minutes, down from the conventional 6 hours--allowing us to provide this incredibly healthy and sustainable ingredient at affordable prices to consumers and product makers. Since launching 10 months ago, we have been able to upcycle 120,000 lbs of wet spent grain, and have launched 2 CPG products in nearly 200 HEB stores. We are now in the works of developing contracts with product makers, bakeries, and even a dog food company!
Headquarters Regions: Southern US

Description: KeepPet is an innovative mobile app which allows pet owners to consult with vet professionals through online chats or video calls
Full Description: Keep your pet healthy with KeepPet: create a digital passport, chat with vets and join a global community of pet owners and veterinary professionals who share their passion of making this world a safe and happy place for our pets.  Main features: - Chats and video calls with the veterinarian - KeepPet Academy where vets publish a monthly digest with valuable information for pet owners - Pet profile with your pet’s pedigree and achievements KeepPet is an innovative mobile app which allows pet owners to consult with vet professionals through online chats or video calls.  The app boasts a global network of certified veterinarians that will ensure timely answers in a blink of an eye. Just search for a vet and start your consultation in a matter of seconds.  When we need to speak to someone about our own health, whether mental or physical, we want to be able to right away, now you can have that same quality service for your beloved pets. KeepPet is your first line of defense to help assess the urgency of your situation. To ensure the quality and relevance of the triage and following steps we will provide you with the nearest available vet. Subscribing your companion means to create a global and digital pet passport that can be shared within the KeepPet’s global veterinarian network and, therefore, become easily accessible in any moment of need from any location. You can keep your pet’s data in one place. No longer will you need to spend hours on the phone having records faxed from office to office. They’ll all be in one easy to access location, allowing the vet to better help right away. Explore your pet’s family tree, and highlight your pet’s achievements. KeepPet is not just an app or a service, it’s a global community of pet owners and veterinary professionals who share their passion of making this world a safe and happy place for our pets.  We share the latest news, scientific approach and innovation with our community. Not only will a vet’s advice be at your fingertips but you can also read about the latest and greatest in veterinary medicine.

Description: EdgeBit provides real-time supply chain security that eliminates noise for your team.
Full Description: SaaS products have unlocked an immense amount of value for enterprises and consumers alike. The cost of that value has been control over our data. With security incidents and sophisticated vendor traversal attacks (like the Aug. 2022 hack of Twilio & Signal) becoming more commonplace, the lack of control is starting to show its true cost. We founded EdgeBit because we believe that we can solve this problem — to empower SaaS services to consume and process data securely — and in a way that maintains customer control over data, without getting in the way.

Description: Leverage AI & machine-learning to measure, attribute and optimize marketing spend in real-time.
Full Description: Sprighub consolidates all of your strategic marketing — plans, goals, campaigns, budgets, and ROI — into one place for better visibility, collaboration, and traceability to provide marketing continuity across teams. With one unified view into your strategic marketing, you will dramatically improve the efficiency of both your team as well as your budgetary investments. A key feature of Sprighub is AI-based budget allocation and planning that provide recommendations to improve overall ROI and allocate investments into the best performing channels based on campaign objectives. The platform also provides alerts and controls that can be configured for anomalies, budget spend thresholds, and goal performance — all integrated into your Slack or Microsoft Teams notification channel — helping your marketing teams make adjustments, take corrective action, and respond in a timely manner to changes in campaigns. We also provide an Account Based Marketing module for mid-market and enterprise B2B clients that delivers and all-in-one AI-based Consumer Data Platform, Attribution Modeling, DIY Segmentation based on behavioral and Intent Scores, Look-Alike recommendations, and an End-to-End Account Journey. This is all offered on a single platform that was built with the efficiency and effectiveness needs of the marketing team in mind.

With Reflekt Me, the entire social media value chain is on your site, for a frictionless path to purchase. With a team of Ph.D. level sociologists, multicultural insights specialists, psychologists, and technologists, they have created an enterprise solution for ecommerce, that empowers shoppers to find the best products for their unique characteristics. Their insights driven technology can personalize the UX experience for eCommerce sites across fashion, hair care, skin care, beauty, and medical industries. Soon we realized the cost of adapting these technologies were too high. This created a big and unnecessary barrier for most organizations to benefit from that. Additionally, it became obvious to us that people were forced to interact with machines in a machine-way (point and click), not a human way (write, speak). This has shaped our vision, mission and our product set. Today, our increasingly digital, always-on world is transforming the way companies function on a daily basis. People now have the ability to control who they interact with, when, and how. So, we’re creating a world where businesses can stay constantly connected to their customers, their way. Description: FirmAuto is an auto-finance company that originates automobile credits using BuroFlex® technology.
Full Description: FirmAuto is an auto-finance company that focuses on originating credit for customers with non-prime and sub-prime credit scores. The company uses an advanced automated decision process program called BuroFlex® to assess the risks associated with each application. The company's founder, Alvaro Quintero, has over 20 years of experience in the financing and leasing industry, with a particular expertise in the sub-prime market. Advisors: ​ Jonathon Angell, CEO of Angell Investments.  Rick Haskell, Risk Management.  Angelo Nyars, Industry Advisor.  Key employees: Ricardo Ramirez, Dealer Relations Manager.  Carlos Betanzo, Operations Manager. Pablo Davila, Finance & Accounting. Problem: Access to mobility is essential for economic advancement, especially in the United States, where owning a car is often necessary for working-class people. Having no credit score or a low score can be a significant obstacle to obtaining a car loan. Solution: FirmAuto USA has developed BuroFlex®, an innovative automated decision-making program that uses various data points from platforms such as CreditSmarts, RouteOne, and Dealertrack to evaluate potential customers and manage risk. BuroFlex® determines whether to authorize credit or not. Uniqueness: BuroFlex® is distinctive due to its use of proprietary technology that leverages in-depth knowledge of debt behavior, which enables more precise and reliable decision-making.

Description: Powering Seamless Event Experiences.
Full Description: Flite is a comprehensive events platform designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating, managing, and hosting live events. It serves as a solution to the operational and marketing complexities that event hosts face, by providing a unified platform for managing staffing, outreach, ticket sales, and communication with stakeholders. Flite caters to the needs of event organizers by addressing one of their primary concerns: stakeholder fragmentation. The platform offers tools that facilitate easier communication and coordination with promoters, DJs, artists, sponsors, and other involved parties, making it more manageable to organize and execute events. The platform stands out by democratizing event hosting, making it accessible for hosts of all sizes to efficiently manage and sell out their events. It leverages the founders' extensive experience in the event industry, incorporating features that are specifically designed to meet the real-world needs of event organizers. By consolidating various aspects of the event management process into a single platform, Flite aims to save hosts time and reduce stress, enabling them to focus more on growing their brand and enhancing the event experience for attendees. Flite targets a wide range of clients, from small social clubs to large event organizations, demonstrating its scalability and versatility in handling events of different magnitudes. Its business model, which includes taking a percentage of ticket sales, ensures that it provides value to its clients by helping them maximize their revenue from events. The platform's effectiveness is underscored by its quick traction and profitability post-launch, indicating its potential to significantly impact the $1.2 trillion live events industry by addressing the common challenges hosts face.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Events, Media and Entertainment

Description: Filio solves a problem that many can relate to: you take a bunch of photos, and then never get around to organizing them.
Full Description: Filio solves a problem that many can relate to: you take a bunch of photos, and then never get around to organizing them. The photos just sit in your phone’s gallery, or maybe in a folder on your computer, but all the details are often lost to history. It is no different for construction and other projects. Employees frequently document projects via photos but miss important details or, when they download the photos days later, forget the exact context or location of many of the images. Filio provides a solution via a cloud-based, integrated mobile and web-based software application that facilitates collection and management of visual information (photos and videos). Filio enables enhanced information collection by augmenting the captured images and videos with geospatial data as well as custom user-defined metadata (such as captions and tags), and uses state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and computer vision for smart labeling and cataloging.

Industries: Delivery, Delivery Service, Drones, Machinery Manufacturing
Description: Wing provides aircrafts that are custom-designed to deliver packages safely, reliably, and efficiently.
Full Description: Wing provides aircrafts that are custom-designed to deliver packages safely, reliably, and efficiently.  The company's UAS traffic management system (UTM) plans the best route, taking into account safety, efficiency, and aviation regulation. Wing’s delivery drone is one of the safest ways to transport for items. The company's aircraft have flown tens of thousands of flights, and we’ve been delivering everyday goods to doorsteps, driveways, and backyards. Wing complies with all regulations in each area we operate, and adheres to an extremely rigorous safety framework. Wing has multiple levels of redundancy built into our aircraft and operations, and these have been thoroughly tested throughout the 70,000 test flights we’ve conducted. Wing has designed a drone that can pick up a package, fly to a designated site, hover over the delivery area, and gently lower the package to the ground at a precise location. The company's drones map a safe route to a designated location using our UAS traffic management system (UTM). The UTM plans a flight path from take-off to landing, avoiding other Wing drones and obstacles.

Description: BitPlus Holdings, LTD is a financial technology management company focused on wealth creation through its subsidiaries.
Full Description: BitPlus Holdings, LTD (BPHL) is a financial technology management company focused on wealth creation through its subsidiaries; Bitplus Hosting (BPH), Global Northern Resources LLC (GNR), BitPlus Technologies LLC (BPT), Bitplus Capital LLC (BPC). BitPlus Hosting (BPH) BPH will offer the only known Single-Phase Liquid Immersion Cooling (SLIC) hosting solution available in North America providing its Cryptomining and Data Center customers a competitive advantage through increased equipment efficiencies. The use of immersion cooling, over time we believe it will render current air-cooled technology obsolete.  In providing greater efficiency to our hosted clients BPH experiences superior client retention and will establish itself as an industry leader in both quality and quantity of clients served, both in Cryptomining and Data. In preparation to capitalize on our power build out, BitPlus Hosting intends to acquire current cryptomining hosting and mining companies and convert them to immersion at their facilities or consolidate their operations to our facilities with extremely low electricity costs.  An added benefit to BPH is that profitability in our own mining operations will be superior to traditional mining and hosting companies, see “BitPlus Capital” below.  Our internal mining expertise is magnified with superior low-cost electricity rates. We produce our own electricity, with our own equipment, from surplus natural gas at rates under $0.03/kWh by way of our owned company, Global Northern Resources, LLC. Global Northern Resources, LLC (GNR)  GNR produces large volume, low cost electricity on owned real estate. We then lease space and land, in conjunction with long-term high margin electricity contracts to clients with large megawatt power needs including; Data processing, Data storage, High-tech manufacturing (I.e. plastics & electronics), Gaming, Cryptomining, Vertical Farming, Logistics & Distribution, Warehousing and Multi-use Land Development projects. Low cost power acquisition is a cornerstone for GNR’s immediate and long-term growth.  Our short-term objective will be to produce 250 MW of electricity by year-end 2021, 500 MW of electricity by year-end 2022 and 1,000MW of electricity by year-end 2024.  We currently have 40MW completed in Colorado Springs, CO with an additional 50MW ready for build out.  In Grand Forks, ND we have 30MW completed with an additional 100MW site identified and in Sarnia, Ontario, Canada we have 58MW available for acquisition.  Our 250MW objective in 2021 will be realized upon meeting our funding objectives.   BitPlus Technologies (BPT) BPT is developing a new, disruptive technology for cryptomining.  Our team of computer scientists have vast experience developing the microchips currently used in the most efficient miners available today.  Our goal is to manufacture a miner specifically designed for immersion cooling.  Once completed and in production our miners will use less electricity and produce the highest possible hashrate currently available in cryptomining.   BitPlus Capital (BPC)   BitPlus Holdings, Ltd (BPHL) also mines cryptocurrency for its own portfolio through our investment firm BitPlus Capital (BPC).  The goal of BitPlus Capital is to generate coins, at institutional volume, below market prices greatly enhancing profitability prior to the management of mined coins. BPC has consistently demonstrated an expertise to generate digital currency far below retail market cost.  Collectively, BPHL encompasses electric power supply and real estate through Global Northern Resources, mining and data hosting through BitPlus Hosting, equipment manufacturing through BitPlus Technologies, and portfolio management through BitPlus Capital.  BPHL in conjunction with BPC, BPH and BPT has as its objective to launch a successful public company while controlling in excess of 10% of Bitcoin hashrate.

Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Payments, Software

Description: DIRT is a protocol for decentralized information curation that uses token staking to incentivize honesty.
Full Description: DIRT is a protocol for decentralized information curation that uses token staking to incentivize honesty. DIRT is not a Token Curated Registry (TCR). DIRT is a protocol to build TCRs.  Similar to Wikipedia, DIRT allows anyone to contribute information. DIRT maintains accuracy at scale because every contributor needs to deposit tokens to write data. If the data is correct, it is freely shared. If the data is incorrect, anyone can challenge the data and earn tokens for identifying these inaccurate facts. Their protocol and platform makes it economically irrational for misinformation to persist in a data set.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Information Technology, Other
